definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]
pinyin: Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4

definition: Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
Checheng township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: We will accelerate the improvement of the social security system that covers both urban and rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 加快健全覆盖城乡居民的社会保障体系。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良状况。

sentences.english: Expanded economic exchanges between towns and rural areas can significantly increase farmers' incomes.
sentences.chinese: 扩大城乡经济往来有利于明显增加农民收入。

sentences.english: Vaudeville was very popular in the United States during the early nineteen hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 在二十世纪初期，歌舞杂耍在美国城乡深受欢迎。

sentences.english: The people in both urban and rural areas have seen their incomes increase and their standards of living improve.
sentences.chinese: 城乡居民收入显著提高，生活水平明显改善。

sentences.english: Introduce the idea and project of CATV fibre-optical netting in urban and rural areas in Ninghua.
sentences.chinese: 介绍宁化县城乡有线电视光纤联网设计思想和方案。

sentences.english: We provided job training for 1 million urban and rural workers.
sentences.chinese: 全年组织100万城乡劳动者插手职业培训。

sentences.english: The external factors are mainly the differences of city and countryside and the school culture.
sentences.chinese: 外部因素主要是城乡差异与学校文化。

sentences.english: Feeding the regional economy of towns , are the ties of urban-rural integration.
sentences.chinese: 小城镇反哺区域经济，是城乡一体化的纽带。

sentences.english: Sometimes you need to get away from it all in order to release your stress.
sentences.chinese: 有时您需要远离城乡一下来疏结您的压力。

sentences.english: Combination zone between urban and rural is a link belt of urban to rural.
sentences.chinese: 城乡结合部是城市向农村的过渡带。

sentences.english: It means farmers will have the same say in the country's decision-making process as urbanites.
sentences.chinese: 中国城乡居民将有望实现在立法机构中“同票同权”。

sentences.english: Financing channel should be widened to encourage the investment of enterprise and urban or rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 要广辟投融资渠道，鼓励企业和城乡居民投资。

sentences.english: The main leaders of the Party Committee in Jiangxi province proposed that Xinyu take the lead to realize the city and countryside integration.
sentences.chinese: 省委主要领导要求新余在全省率先实现城乡一体化。

sentences.english: The fourth part of the urban and rural planning to participate is improving the vision system.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是对我国城乡规划中参与制度的完善构想。

sentences.english: The urban and rural planning is an important public policy.
sentences.chinese: 城乡规划是政府的一项重要公共政策。

definition: Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Huimin county in Binzhou 濱州|滨州[Bin1 zhou1], Shandong
